did.unittitle: Paul Gordon Collection of Academy of Management Miscellany, 1986-1987
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Correspondence regarding the nomination of Paul Gordon for an Outstanding Service Award.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of correspondence regarding the nomination of Paul Gordon for an Outstanding Service Award.

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: Paul Gordon Collection of Academy of Management Miscellany #5904m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
